title: What are your thoughts on life mottos? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ve never heard of a life motto, except maybe What does not kill me makes me strong. In my experience, what didn’t kill me made me weaken. Wait - that’s my life motto: It’s a great life if you don’t weaken or get started out wrong.
Whatever things not going in ur way. Just think we should thank all these ppl. Bcos they help you to be able to improve.
